constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Social Services

decision_conditions: The Council considers the introduction of 3 louvres (as clouded)  measuring 150mm x 150mm to tumble dryers to ventilate to atmosphere to be non-material and as such, it is recommended that a S96A application for a non-material amendment be granted subject to the additional condition belowAmended Condition17) No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant other than those shown on the approved drawings (including KDNH-IBI-00-ZZ-M2-BA-000-0200 Proposed Elevation Rev 23, KDNH-IBI-00-GF-M2-BA-000-0101Proposed Ground Floor Plan17, KDNH-IBI-00-01-M2-BA-000-0102Proposed First Floor Plan 17, KDNH-IBI-00-02-M2-BA-000-0103 - Proposed Second Floor Plan Rev 20)  shall be installed without the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the occupiers of neighbouring properties and the visual amenities of the area in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.Additional Condition 20Any conflict between the approved drawings listed in Condition 2 of Planning Permission 19/00582/FUL and Condition 17 as amended by this permission shall be resolved in favour of amended condition 17 for the purposes of louvres only.Reason: For the avoidance of doubt.
description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 19/00582/FUL (Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a new 80 bed, three-storey dementia nursing home (Use Class C2) with associated gardens, pedestrian and vehicle access, car parking and servicing area). Amendment - 3 number louvres as clouded proposed measuring 150mm x 150mm to tumble dryers to ventilate to atmosphere.
